alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 22 at 8:46AM EST until further notice by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Holmes, Knox, Mahoning, Stark, Trumbull, and Wayne Counties in northern Ohio. Crawford County in northwest Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall amounts of 0.75 to 1 inch today on top of already saturated ground and recently high flow on waterways may result in flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
